item.title: ADHD not Being Real
item.author: prma.dev@protonmail.com (Perma)
item.description: ADHD is not real. It is just unmotivated kids needing more structure. – Some lady today Therefore: Cancer is not real. It is just overly horny cells needing to chill the fuck down. – Probably the same lady, assuming no double standards
